wikipedia_page.main: Roy "The Boy" Brindley (born June 10, 1969 in Southampton) and educated at St Mary's Independent School is an English professional poker player, now living in Wicklow, Ireland.

response: *2003 BBC UK Style filmed an episode of Barefoot Doctor which featured greyhound trainer Linda Jones and then magazine editor Roy Brindley
